group_1.textCenter: Let's at least warn the Magical Girls in the@west to avoid going to Chuo Ward.

group_1.narration: A few days have passed since Mifuyu@and Yachiyo sent out the warning to@avoid going to Chuo Ward...

group_1.textLeft: Go home before you get hurt, you sheltered@baby princesses!

group_1.textRight: You're the ones who should be going home.
Our team has secured this area, after all!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800203:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]That's not for you to decide!

group_1.narration: [flashEffect:flashRed1][surround:715000A05]"Ow! You better believe I'm not@going down without a fight!"
However, of course the Magical Girls who@had already started to fight in Chuo Ward@paid no attention to the warning...
The conflict between the east and the west@continued to intensify...

group_1.textRight: This is real bad! Some more Magical Girls@got hurt!
Girls from all sides - east, west, and even@Chuo - got caught up in the crossfire!

group_1.textLeft: Again?!

group_1.textRight: Wah!

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeSmall]Who is it now?! Wasn't I clear enough with@my warning to avoid Chuo Ward?!

group_1.textRight: Yachan, calm down. We need to stay calm.

group_1.textLeft: My apologies... I'll take a minute to go @collect myself.

group_1.textRight: Yes, I think that would be best.
That's the first time I've ever seen Yachiyo@so worked up. That table took the heat.

group_1.textLeft: The table's fine. I'm more concerned about@Yachan's hand.

group_1.textRight: Oh, right...

group_1.textLeft: I also understand how she feels.
There's nothing that can be done...
I didn't think that they'd so blatantly@disregard our warning.

group_1.textRight: Hey, is cooperating with Kanagi out of the@question?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, because we have nothing to use to@negotiate with her.
If only we knew who was behind the first@attack...

group_1.textRight: The person behind the first attack, huh?
Hmm, come to think of it...
This whole thing totally wouldn't have gotten@so serious if that attack hadn't happened.
So maybe someone is looking to get something@out of fanning the tensions between us.

group_1.textLeft: Someone who will benefit from Magical Girls@hurting each other?

group_1.textRight: Or they could be trying to make things so@bad that both the east and west fall.
It could be someone on the inside...
Or someone outside of Kamihama City? Maybe@they, like, want Kamihama all to themselves!
Or maybe...this is the work of a Witch?!
Well? Well? Pretty good detective work,@huh?!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Sure is.

group_1.textRight: You should laugh more, Mifuyu.
I mean, I know it's easy for me to say,@y'know, with the situation and all, but...

group_1.textLeft: You're right. I can't afford to be so@negative.
Tsuruno, I'm heading out so I'll leave Yachan@to you.
Please listen to what she has to say.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Bwuh?! Where are you going?

group_1.textLeft: To Chuo Ward. A certain someone has called@me out there.

group_1.textRight: Will you be okay by yourself?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I'll be meeting with a rational@person. It won't end in a fight.

group_1.textRight: Are you okay?! Stay with me!

group_1.textLeft: Ugh...

group_1.textRight: (She's not conscious, but she's breathing.)
(She's hurt really bad and her Soul Gem is@so cloudy...)
(I need to treat her and purify it...)
*Sigh* Now I hope she regains@consciousness...
(I haven't seen her around before, so she@must be from the east, or Chuo Ward.)
(What on earth happened? I've got an idea,@but...)

group_1.textLeft: Urgh... I... I...

group_1.textRight: Thank goodness. You've regained@consciousness.

group_1.textLeft: Ahhhhhh! M-Mifuyu Azusa?!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100602:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh? Hang on now. Please calm down.

group_1.textLeft: S-so it's true then!
The west really are trying to chase out the@Chuo Ward Magical Girls!

group_1.textRight: Calm down. I didn't come here to cause@any harm.

group_1.textLeft: Lies! I was attacked by a girl from the west@just now!
She said she just found herself a new hunting@ground and ran me out.
I hate this... I really hate this... No one's@honoring the agreement.
Why does this keep happening to me?!

group_1.textRight: (Sounds like the Magical Girls from the west@are breaking the agreement, too...)
(I was just about to go in for a talk, but@now I've got another problem to deal with.)
(But first, I better calm this girl down@and send her home.)
